body: "Tired of hearing of all the disasters, mistakes, deliberate wrongdoing and accumulated grief that made up 2010, in Jamaica," Petchary suggests instead that readers welcome the new year by enjoying the present moment: "a green and gold morning with sunlight seeping through the trees."
original_body: "Tired of hearing of all the disasters, mistakes, deliberate wrongdoing and accumulated grief that made up 2010, in Jamaica," Petchary suggests instead that readers welcome the new year by enjoying the present moment: "a green and gold morning with sunlight seeping through the trees."
title: Jamaica: in the moment
